p: Table 2 shows the demographic characteristics of the patients, who were included, or not, in the transmission clusters. Statistically significant differences were observed between the patients included, or not, in the clusters. The association was more frequent in Spanish (p = 0.02) men (p< 0.001), MSM (p<0.001), younger than 35 years (p = 0.001) and with a CD4+ T-cell count above 350 cells/ul (p<0.001).
